content:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74595#issuecomment-683997394 asks for a blog post but I am not quite sure about the target audience here.

Can someone elaborate on what that blog post should entail and potentially point me to something I can use as a reference here?
@lcnr the target audience would be "folks whose code may be broken by this change", it would explain what is coming, if you're affected, and how to fix it
